name: Jumping Jacks
description: A full-body cardiovascular exercise. Stand with feet together and arms at sides, then jump while raising arms and spreading legs.

name: Push-Ups
description: A classic upper body exercise. Keep your body in a straight line from head to heels, lower your chest to the floor, then push back up.

name: Bodyweight Squats
description: A fundamental lower body movement. Lower your hips back and down as if sitting in a chair, keeping your chest up and knees behind toes.

name: Dumbbell Bicep Curls
description: Hold a dumbbell in each hand. Keeping your elbows close to your torso, curl the weights up towards your shoulders, then slowly lower.

name: Dumbbell Shoulder Press
description: Sit or stand with dumbbells at shoulder level. Press upward until arms are fully extended, then lower back down.

name: Lunges
description: Step forward with one leg, lowering your hips until both knees are bent at a 90-degree angle. Push back to the start. Alternate legs.

name: Dumbbell Lunges
description: Hold dumbbells in each hand while performing lunges for added resistance and strength building.

name: Plank
description: Hold a push-up position with your weight on your forearms and toes. Engage your core and keep your body in a straight line.

name: Russian Twists
description: Sit on the floor, lean back slightly, and twist your torso from side to side while holding a weight or without.

name: Dumbbell Russian Twists
description: Perform Russian twists while holding a dumbbell for increased core engagement and strength.

name: Burpees
description: A full-body exercise: squat down, kick back into plank, do a push-up, return to squat, and jump up.

name: Mountain Climbers
description: Start in plank position and alternate bringing knees to chest in a running motion.
